summary: Frontend testing for cache-first performance overhaul on 4 property pages. ALL PAGES PASS - no loading spinners found, all pages render content instantly using cache-first pattern with getCachedSync/setCacheSync. Fixed missing ActivityIndicator import in boost page.

minor.issue: Returns 520 status occasionally (server error), but cache-first pattern masks this from users

critical_code_review_comments: Cache-first pattern correctly implemented across all 4 property pages using getCachedSync/setCacheSync
No ActivityIndicator imports or page-level loading states in property pages (except button processing state)
Property List shows 'Updating...' text for background refresh instead of blocking spinner
Property Detail shows 'not found' state if property not in cache and API fails
Property Chat initializes with INITIAL_MESSAGES for instant chat UI
Property Boost has ActivityIndicator only for button processing state (valid use case)
localStorage quota exceeded warning persists (minor issue - doesn't affect functionality)

bug_fixes.issue: ActivityIndicator used but not imported from react-native
bug_fixes.note: This ActivityIndicator is for button processing state during payment, which is a valid use case

test_credentials.note: Testing done without authentication to verify cache-first pattern renders instant UI for unauthenticated users

context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 180 verified cache-first pattern for all 4 property pages mentioned in the review request. All pages load instantly without spinners. Fixed missing ActivityIndicator import in boost page. The ActivityIndicator in boost page is only used for button processing state during payment, not for page loading. localStorage quota exceeded warning still persists from previous iterations but doesn't block functionality.
